title: Split pea soup with ham
ingredients: ['450g dried green split peas', '2 litres water', '1 meaty ham bone', '150g chopped onion', '1/4 teaspoon dried marjoram leaves, crushed', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme leaves, crushed', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '120g chopped celery', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste']
